item.description:
The Boston Entertainment Leadership Council is a group of leaders committed to enhancing and cultivating the existing arts and entertainment community within Boston while at the same time generating new artistic endeavors aimed at rebranding the Boston Arts Scene to place Boston on the map as an arts and entertainment destination.


This week, the Council will begin the brand shaping process for our vision of the Boston Arts and Entertainment Community. Through this process, it is critical that we focus on both the positive elements of the current Arts and Entertainment Community and on a vision for the future community. With this in mind, please come to the meeting with a pitch for how you would sell Boston as an A&E destination to a non-Bostonian. That is, tell us why he or she should come to Boston instead of New York, LA or Austin for Arts and Entertainment. Likewise, please be prepared to discuss your pitch for a dream A&E Community in Boston.
item.name: Boston Entertainment Leadership Council
